snippet: John Gaudreau had a hat trick, Riley Barber scored twice and the United States beat the Czech Republic on Wednesday to reach the semifinals of the world junior hockey championships.
abstract: United States defeats Czech Republic, 7-0, to reach semifinals of world junior hockey championships.
lead_paragraph: John Gaudreau had a hat trick, Riley Barber scored twice and the United States beat the Czech Republic on Wednesday to reach the semifinals of the world junior hockey championships.

headline.main: U.S. in Semifinals of World Junior Hockey Championships
headline.print_headline: U.S. in Semifinals of World Juniors
